kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
There's now a prototype example in the [Kentico Community Portal](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/releases/tag/v29.6.1.10) which shows how you can send file contents to the browser and initiate a download of the file.
* [RecipientListOverviewExtender.cs](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v29.6.1.10/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Features/RecipientLists/RecipientListOverviewExtender.cs#L66) - creates the `EXPORT_LIST` command called by the client * [DataExportComponent.tsx](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v29.6.1.10/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Client/src/components/DataExportComponent.tsx#L60) - initiates the file download from a CTA
I'm sure there are many ways to refine this setup, but it "works" and should be able to scale to downloading files up to a hundred MB in size.
